title: Handle Missed Cruise Departure
description: A passenger missed their cruise ship's departure. They need to know their options for joining the cruise at the next port.

tasks.description: Retrieve the passenger's cruise booking and the ship's itinerary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the passenger and the ship's next port of call.

tasks.description: Advise the passenger on options for traveling to the next port (e.g., booking a flight).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides helpful advice on how to rejoin the cruise, clarifying that the travel is at the passenger's own expense.

tasks.description: Notify the ship's guest services of the passenger's intention to join at the next port.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends a notification to the ship.
